alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 1:04AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ST. TAMMANY PARISH, HARRISON, HANCOCK, NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND CENTRAL PEARL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 200 AM CST... At 103 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Augusta to near Lacombe. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Slidell, Long Beach, Picayune, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Pearl River, Kiln, Pearlington, Lacombe, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Stennis Space Center, Saucier, Mcneil, Gulfport Airport, and Slidell Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 259 and 273. Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 39. Interstate 12 between mile markers 72 and 84. Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
